[[File:Tet Thumbnail 0.jpg|thumb|Key art]]

'''Tetris Add-On''' is an official add-on developed by ''Jigarbov Productions'', based off of the popular ''[[Minecraft x Tetris|Tetris]]'' video game franchise.

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|Bring Tetris® magic to any of your worlds with the Tetris add-on. Power up the Tetrimino Generator and watch your biomes transform with falling Tetriminos! Break them open for glittering Mino shards which can be used to make Tetris-inspired tools and blocks!|Minecraft Marketplace description}}
